revised_title: Interaction of Colloidal Metallic Particles and the Influence of Electrolytes
tldr: This article investigates the interaction of two colloidal metallic particles in hydrophobic colloidal solutions and the influence of electrolytes. The authors develop a method to calculate the mutual electrical energy of the particles using the Debye-Huckel equation and compute the van der Waals energy. The resulting energy curves help explain various properties of the colloidal solutions, such as stability, coagulation, and flocculation.
